carrier_master.shared_leadership_note: Kelly Conley (CFO) and Wade Rubin (CCO) serve both RTI and TLI. Enterprise play: one negotiation closes two fleets (1,220 combined trucks).
carrier_master.fit_rationale: 470+ trucks dry van OTR. Shared C-suite with RTI = enterprise play. One deal closes 1,220 trucks. Arkansas-based. Good corridor alignment.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: Enterprise deal — RTI + TLI together = 1,220 trucks, one negotiation
carrier_master.recommended_entry_persona: Kelly Conley (shared CFO) or Wade Rubin (shared CCO)
carrier_master.exec_summary: Transco Lines (TLI) is a privately held Russellville AR dry van carrier with 470+ trucks, 1,800 trailers. Shares C-suite leadership with Riverside Transport (RTI). Combined enterprise play = 1,220 trucks, 4,300 trailers. One negotiation closes two fleets.

carrier_contacts.title: Chief Financial Officer (shared RTI/TLI)
carrier_contacts.notes: Shared CFO for both RTI and TLI. Key to enterprise deal.

carrier_contacts.title: Chief Commercial Officer (shared RTI/TLI)
carrier_contacts.notes: Shared CCO for both RTI and TLI.
